forum.name: Solving Rational Numbers Tasks in Multiple Ways
forum.intro:
Reflect on the previous activity in the discussion forum below. Consider the learning opportunities that different types of rational numbers tasks provide for adult learners.

Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Respond to the following:

  1. How was the review of your instructional materials focusing on rational numbers? What insights did you gain from the review?
  2. Compare and contrast the types of learning opportunities that “naked number” tasks and rational numbers with meaningful context tasks (i.e., life/cultural context, real-world situations) provide for learners.

Remember to read and respond to others’ postings. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
